document.title: EiffelStudio preferences for Tools: Introduction
document.paragraph:
This section of the help deals with preferences related to a tool in particular. These preferences are distributed in two categories:
20_context_tools.xml Context Tools : They will be used to change properties of some of the context tools.
30_diagram_tools.xml Diagram Tool : They will allow you to customize some features of the diagram tool, mostly colors and fonts for graphical element display.
